banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: The importance of emotional tone in the digital age
videoData.socialTitle: The importance of emotional tone in the digital age

nodes.whoTheyAre: Kareem Yusuf is responsible for software development and SaaS operations for the ExperienceOne customer engagement solution set in IBM, a core element of IBM’s Smarter Commerce initiative. He has been with IBM for 16 years, joining IBM’s software development lab in Hursley, U.K. after completing a PhD from the University of Leeds. Outside his day to day duties, Yusuf maintains an active interest in all things technical, with a particular interest in digital media and programming languages.

videoData.description: Technology can be dehumanizing. Even our day-to-day personal interactions conducted in digital bursts risk losing the heart of who are. Kareem Yusuf shows how people have aimed to embed emotional "tone" into their digital lives, from text-messages to data. He explores why, in today's fully digitized and globalized world, we must strive to incorporate tone into everything we do.
